Header.title: Explore Edwin and Lina Farm
Header.paragraph: Our journey begins with the finest care and nurturing of our poultry, ensuring their well-being and health.

About.paragraph: At Edwin and Lina Poultry Farm, we are passionate about poultry. With decades of experience, we've honed our craft to provide top-quality, healthy poultry products. Our commitment to ethical farming practices ensures the well-being of our birds and the exceptional taste of our offerings.

Services.name: Egg Delivery Services
Services.text: Enjoy the convenience of fresh, farm-to-table eggs delivered right to your place. Our efficient delivery ensures you have access to the finest quality eggs without leaving your place.

Services.name: Piggery Services
Services.text: Whether you're a seasoned farmer or just starting, our expert team ensures the health and well-being of your pigs. From breeding to nutrition management, we've got your piggery needs covered.

Services.name: Poultry Cage and Building Solutions
Services.text: We specialize in designing and constructing poultry cages and buildings that prioritize the comfort and safety of your feathered friends. Give your poultry a home that enhances their growth and maximizes your farm's efficiency!

Contact.address: #403 Recto Avenue, Brgy. Lumil, San Jose, Batangas, Philippines 4227

Highlights.title: Quality Eggs
Highlights.text: Dive into a commitment to excellence as Edwin and Lina Poultry Farm takes center stage in ensuring top-tier egg quality. With a hands-on approach, they personally manufacture their feeds, armed with an intricate understanding of the nutritional nuances essential for producing eggs of unparalleled quality.

Highlights.title: Located at Egg Basket of the Philippines
Highlights.text: Nestled in the heart of San Jose, Batangas, known as the egg basket of the Philippines, the Edwin and Lina farm stands as a key contributor to the region's egg production. San Jose proudly supplies 30% of the country's eggs, with approximately 10% of the municipality's businesses thriving in the egg industry.

Highlights.title: An Eco-friendly Farm
Highlights.text: We have implemented a state-of-the-art biogas system that converts organic waste from our farm into renewable energy. This not only reduces our reliance on fossil fuels but also minimizes our carbon footprint, contributing to a cleaner environment.

Milestone.title: Seeds of Swineherd Success
Milestone.description: Following the union of Mr. Edwin and Lina, they embarked on a journey as swineherds, tending to a herd of 20 pigs owned by Mr. Edwin's mother.

Milestone.title: Expanding the Livestock Legacy
Milestone.description: Taking control, they nurtured their own 40 pigs and 1100 chickens, witnessing the roots of their thriving enterprise.

Milestone.title: From Local to Regional
Milestone.description: Diversifying, they introduced egg delivery services, initially within Batangas and later expanding to Cavite.

Milestone.title: Nationwide Egg Suppliers
Milestone.description: The farm's growth saw their egg delivery venture spreading across the Philippines, establishing them as prominent egg suppliers in Samar, Bicol, and Mindoro.

Milestone.title: Branching Out in Mindoro
Milestone.description: Continuing their expansion, they establish an outlet in Mindoro, solidifying their presence and impact in the agricultural landscape.
